description: Detects the registration of a new ODBC driver.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: New ODBC Driver Registered
query: (((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\ODBC\\ODBCINST.INI\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Driver) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SQL\ Server\\* AND winlog.event_data.Details:"%WINDIR%\System32\SQLSRV32.dll"))) AND (NOT (((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\ Access\ * AND winlog.event_data.Details:C\:\\Progra* AND winlog.event_data.Details:*\\ACEODBC.DLL)) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\ Excel\ Driver* AND winlog.event_data.Details:C\:\\Progra* AND winlog.event_data.Details:*\\ACEODBC.DLL)))))
